name: Temple Run (itch) (BD Games)
description:
There is a boulder rolling at you from who knows where and you're stuck on a long platform, what do you do?...RUN!

jump over lava pits and circular saws, dodge quicksand traps, and more in this awesome Indiana Jones type game.

tap to swiftly turn corners and jump to avoid falling off the edge of the platform, double-tap and jump even higher to avoid bigger obstacles, 

buy different characters in the store and run in style while being chased by a huge boulder trying to roll you over, doesn't that sound fun?
